#summary Details on addNotificationSetting() API function
#sidebar ApiFunctions

Call this function to add a new notification destination for a specific notification type.

 * Email notifications begins with 'Email'
 * XML notifications begins with 'Curl'

For more informations about Delcampe's notifications, see [Notifications].

=== Call ===

 * syntax : addNotificationSetting(string token, string type, string destination)

 * parameter 1 : _string_ : secret token
 * parameter 2 : _string_ : notification type. Call [getAvailableNotifications]() to get a list of notification types
 * parameter 3 : _string_ : destination where we have to send the notification

=== Response ===

 * ResponseSimple

=== Notification === 
 * None

=== Code example (PHP) ===
{{{
//FUNCTION CALL
$objSoapClient = new SoapClient('http://api.delcampe.net/soap.php?wsdl');
list($success, $token) = $objSoapClient->authenticateUser('MyPersonalApiKey');

if (true === $success) {
  $return = $objSoapClient->addNotificationSetting($token, 'Curl_Seller_Item_Add', 'http://www.mysite.net/feedback_api.php?token=bob');
  if ($return[0] === true) {
    var_export($return[1], 1);
  } else {
    echo 'Function call failed. Error message : ' . $return[1]; 
  }
}
}}}
